jrobots.simulation.scenario

Interface SimulationModeState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RaceMode.RaceModeState

    public interface SimulationModeState
extends java.io.Serializable
    PRELIM SimulationStates are singletons and may not have state. But they may provide some state implementation which is stored in the current SimulationState.
